articles.description: Facebook’s Venue is a new app that’s designed to make the process of watching live events more social. The digital companion app will first be used with Sunday’s NASCAR race.
articles.content:
A second-screen experience called Venue
Venue will attempt to curate fan discussion while an event takes place.
Image: Facebook

articles.title: The Ford Mustang Mach 1 Is Back As The 'Most Track-Capable 5.0-Liter Mustang Ever' - Jalopnik
articles.description: There are probably too many Mustangs currently on sale. If you don’t already like any of those for some reason, the iconic Ford Mustang Mach 1 is officially returning this year, and Ford is promising track-focused performance and it’s got the holes to prove i…
